title: Squoosh
content:
S Q U O O S H   
   
i had to look this word up... (i am a neutralized American residing in Sweden) so i amn't quite familiar with modern English vocabulary...   
   
so i found this..   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000745im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20572.gif)   
   
   
   
what the HEX is the font they use...that can make double-O's look like a skateboard..
author: zpunktled

comments.content: As far as I know, those are GIF images that they use for the phonetic characters.

: )   
   
i was just trying to be funny..   
   
Thanx for answering in a professionally serious way
Oh. I'm not in my right mind tonight ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000745im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
